Parameter

Value

Name

Specify the name of the new bulk email. The name will be displayed in the Bulk emails section list only, the recipients will not see it.

Goal

Enter a brief description of the email's goal. This can be promoting products or services, announcing sales or events, building brand awareness.

Email type

Specify the type of your email, for example, "Focus email" or "Newsletter."

Category (Creatio 8.2.0)

The following bulk email categories are used in Creatio:

  • A bulk email is sent to a large number of recipients manually.

  • A trigger email is sent as a result of a particular event or action performed by a website visitor. In Creatio, trigger emails can only be sent as part of a campaign.

Sending method (Creatio 8.2.1 and later)

The following sending methods are available in Creatio:

  • Manual at optimal time. Sends emails to a large number of recipients whenever you want.

  • Using a campaign flow. Sends an email as part of a specific campaign event. Learn more: Add a campaign.
